## SOAAttribSpec interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SOAAttribSpec extends AOSAttribSpec 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [buf](./soa.soaattribspec.buf.md) | <code>ArrayBuffer</code> | Optional user supplied backing buffer. |
|  [byteOffset](./soa.soaattribspec.byteoffset.md) | <code>number</code> | Optional start offset for mapped region in backing buffer. Only used if <code>buf</code> is given. |
|  [stride](./soa.soaattribspec.stride.md) | <code>number</code> | Number of indices between each SOA value. MUST be &gt;<!-- -->= size Default: size |
